description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Days of Our Lives Spoilers For The Week of 3-31-25 Honor John By Bringing Back His Worst Enemy
description: Days of Our Lives spoilers for the week of 3-31-25 bring back John's worst enemy, and there's no better way to honor the late soap hero. The post Days of Our Lives Spoilers For The Week of 3-31-25 Honor John By Bringing Back His Worst Enemy appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jack Ori

title: Why Shameless Should Never Be Revived
description: Shameless is having a second life on streaming, but after 11 seasons, the series shouldn't follow in Dexter's footsteps. The post Why Shameless Should Never Be Revived appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Paul Dailly

title: What to Watch This Week: 40 Premieres, Finales and More
description: To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025. This week, you’ll find a dozen new shows (including Kevin Bacon in The Bondsman, Michelle […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: Amber Ruffin Will No Longer Headline White House Correspondents’ Dinner
description: The White House Correspondents’ Association is changing its dinner plans: Emmy and Tony Award-nominated writer and comedian Amber Ruffin will no longer serve as the feature entertainer at the organization’s annual fundraiser, according to CNN journalist Brian Stelter. “At this consequential moment for journalism, I want to ensure the focus is not on the politics […]
author: Gabriela Silva
